version-1.0.name: Understanding & Working with Git
version-1.0.description: Git is the the source code control system used for both commercial and Open Source projects. This is your first step in understanding how Git helps developers to manage their source code and how to make it part of your daily development workflow.

version-1.0.name: Understanding & Working with GitHub
version-1.0.description: As a leader in cloud-based Git systems it's important for web developers to understand its capabilities. In this course you'll learn how it is used not only to manage your team's source code, but also how it can help improve project management.

version-1.0.name: Advanced Git
version-1.0.description: To become a senior web developer you'll need to understand Git techniques and workflow processes that will make you an effective part of your team. As part of this you'll learn how to solve complex situations and problems using Git.

version-1.0.name: Building Webpages
version-1.0.description: Learn how to build simple webpages using HTML and CSS

version-1.0.name: Beginning Javascript
version-1.0.description: Learn the basics of the Javascript language

version-1.0.name: Intermediate Javascript
version-1.0.description: Gain insight into how Javascript handles datatypes and objects

version-1.0.name: Advanced Javascript
version-1.0.description: Acquire and indepth understanding of asynchronous operations and modern ES6 Javascript

version-1.0.name: Git and GitHub
version-1.0.description: Maintaining your source code and publishing the body of work you create on an Open Source collaboration site are basic skills you'll need as a web developer. Complete this prerequisite before starting the four tiers of the P1XT Guide

version-1.0.name: P1XT Guide: Tier 1 - Getting Started
version-1.0.description: Prerequisite knowledge you will need before starting the courses that make up the four tiers of the P1XT Guide

version-1.0.name: P1XT Guide: Tier 2 - Develop More Expertise
version-1.0.description: Establish a solid foundational understanding of Javascript, HTML, and CSS

version-1.0.name: P1XT Guide: Tier 3 - Add More Rigor
version-1.0.description: Increase your knowledge by learning functional programming and webdev technologies and techniques.

version-1.0.name: P1XT Guide: Tier 4 - Polish the Rough Edges
version-1.0.description: Round out your knowledge by increasing your knowledge of advanced subjects like Artificial Intelligence, and put your knowledge to the test by completing advanced projects.

version-1.0.name: HTML Basics
version-1.0.description: Learn the basics of HTML - the standard used to define webpages.

version-1.0.name: CSS Basics
version-1.0.description: Learn the basics of CSS - the standard used to style webpages.

version-1.0.name: Marrying HTML & CSS
version-1.0.description: Learn how to combine HTML and CSS to create a professional webpage

version-1.0.name: Intermediate HTML
version-1.0.description: Improve your HTML knowledge with additional HTML programming techniques

version-1.0.name: Intermediate CSS
version-1.0.description: Improve your CSS knowledge with additional CSS programming techniques

version-1.0.name: Advanced HTML & CSS
version-1.0.description: Polish your HTML and CSS knowledge and skills with advanced techniques

version-1.0.name: Introduction to Bootstrap
version-1.0.description: Learn how to use the Bootstrap Library for styling

version-1.0.name: Introduction to Foundation
version-1.0.description: Learn how to use the Foundation Library for styling

version-1.0.name: Introduction to Sass
version-1.0.description: Learn how to use the Sass Library for styling

version-1.0.name: Introduction to Less
version-1.0.description: Learn how to use the Less Library for styling

version-1.0.name: Introduction to Stylus
version-1.0.description: Learn how to use the Stylus Library for styling

version-1.0.name: Learn How the Web Works
version-1.0.description: Learn How the Internet and World Wide Web Work

version-1.0.name: Getting Started with the Web
version-1.0.description: Learn how to set up a web project folder and file system for you projects

version-1.0.name: State, Actions, and Reducers
version-1.0.description: Gain insight into the fundamentals of how Redux works.

version-1.0.name: The Redux Store
version-1.0.description: Learn about the Redux Store.

version-1.0.name: Putting it All Together: React & Redux
version-1.0.description: See how React and Redux can work together in this simple example.

version-1.0.name: Avoiding Mutations in Redux
version-1.0.description: Understand how to avoid array and object mutations in Redux.

version-1.0.name: Example: Creating a ToDo Application
version-1.0.description: Learn how to build an app application using Redux.

version-1.0.name: Understanding Reducer Composition
version-1.0.description: Learn about reducer composition in Redux.

version-1.0.name: Example: Adding Features to the ToDo Application
version-1.0.description: Extend your knowledge of Redux through this example of how to add new features to the ToDo app.

version-1.0.name: Extracting Presentational Components
version-1.0.description: See how to extract presentational components to separate app behavior from appearance.

version-1.0.name: Extracting Container Components
version-1.0.description: Learn the how and why of extracting container components to limit the unnecessary passing of props.

version-1.0.name: Passing the Store to App Components
version-1.0.description: Learn the how and why of extracting container components to limit the unnecessary passing of props.

version-1.0.name: Generating Containers
version-1.0.description: Learn the how to use Redux to generate container components.

version-1.0.name: Extracting Action Creators
version-1.0.description: Learn how to extract action creators from components to improve the maintainability of your apps.

version-1.0.name: What is React?
version-1.0.description: Learn what ReactJS is useful for and how to set up your development environment to begin writing apps that rely on it.

version-1.0.name: All About Components
version-1.0.description: Learn about ReactJS Components and how they function in and app.

version-1.0.name: Props, Events, and State
version-1.0.description: Learn about ReactJS Components and how they function in and app.

version-1.0.name: Stateful Components, Stateless Components, and the DOM
version-1.0.description: Learn about state and its interaction with the DOM.

version-1.0.name: Communicating Between Components and the ReactJS Lifecycle
version-1.0.description: Learn how to communicate between parent and child components, as well as about the lifecycle of a React app.

version-1.0.name: React Routing
version-1.0.description: Learn about React Router and how to leverage it in your applications.
